quotes.text: Second Cosmic Seal:(Seal of Karl 666) One who has received this Cosmic Seal is empowered to control not less than 160,000 spirits. Many great politicians, military commanders, etc. on earth are at this occult level of operations. This will be the occult level of Antichrist.
quotes.author: Compton Gage

quotes.text: Go thy way, weigh me the weight of the fire, or measure me the blast of the wind, or call me again the day that is past.
quotes.author: Compton Gage

quotes.text: It is the people that are angry at the status quo that makes a decision to bring change.

quotes.text: What we are, not what we know, is what brings us prosperity.

quotes.text: ...it is inevitable that women will be victimized by the sciences and their technologies in a society such as ours where women have little power, where almost all scientific research is technology-driven, and here political issues are posed as requiring merely technological "solutions".
quotes.author: Sandra Harding

quotes.text: Conflicts have small beginnings.

quotes.text: When wisdom is gold, then knowledge is fool's gold.

quotes.text: Ignorance is what is destroying us and not the devil.

quotes.text: Death is the ultimate cessation of the individual Self.

quotes.text: No one is exempt from the call to find common ground.

quotes.text: Our heart calls us one way, the mind pulls us the other way, and we do the opposite. We cannot find peace when the mind rages war against the heart, when we fight with our thoughts the pull of our love.

quotes.text: Managing to follow through for a day is good. But, managing to follow through every day, for days, weeks and months creates authentic and consistent results.

quotes.text: Sharing pictures of yourself in front of houses you don't own, standing by cars you don't drive, and holding money that isn't yours as you lie that it is, only sets you up for questions you can't answer and a completely false foundation.

quotes.text: The Fall was a fall from innocence to knowledge.

quotes.text: Most of the beautiful things in the world are done effortlessly.
quotes.author: Johnstone Muchiri

quotes.text: The greatest virtue a person can have is not the fortune of material goods, but the fortune of intellectual values. This is the only way this world can be a better place.
quotes.author: Maria Karvouni

quotes.text: Many are they that rise up against you. Many there be which say of your soul, '˜'There is no help for you.'' But the instruments of death is prepared for your cause.

quotes.text: At the root of every form of ungodliness, injustice, nepotism, selfishness, every rivalry and competitive jealousy, is the monster called greed.

quotes.text: Your mission or purpose is like a magnet that keeps you moving is a well established direction
quotes.author: Doris P. Johnson

quotes.text: I do not consider it an insult, but rather a compliment to be called an agnostic. I do not pretend to know where many ignorant men are sure '” that is all that agnosticism means.

quotes.text: If you can't impress them with your argument, impress them with your actions.

quotes.text: Great minds are always feared by lesser minds.

quotes.text: Life is like a game of chess.To win you have to make a move.Knowing which move to make comes with IN-SIGHTand knowledge, and by learning the lessons that areacculated along the way.We become each and every piece within the game called life!

quotes.text: Your purpose is more than just being happy, but it's about making others to be blessed and happy.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.text: Learn from those who have paved the way before you. - Kailin Gow on Wisdom
quotes.author: Kailin Gow

quotes.text: Some team members act as adhesives to unite the team.
quotes.author: Rajen Jani

quotes.text: Knowledge, like all things, is best in moderation," intoned the Will. "Knowing everything means you don't need to think, and that is very dangerous.

quotes.text: People always want to know things . . . until they hear them, and then it's too late. Knowledge is a rug of a certain size, and the world is larger. It's not what remains uncovered at the edges that should worry you, rather what is swept beneath.
